Scripts.OnLoad:
self.Update = Altoholic:GetClassExtension("AltoClassIconsContainer","Update") self.ShowChildFrames = Altoholic:GetClassExtension("AltoFrame","ShowChildFrames") self.HideChildFrames = Altoholic:GetClassExtension("AltoFrame","HideChildFrames")
local prefix = self.iconPrefix
-- auto create the sort buttons, with the quantity passed as key for i = 1, self.numIcons do local frame = CreateFrame("Button", nil, self, self.iconTemplate)
if i == 1 then frame:SetPoint("TOPLEFT") else -- attach to previous frame frame:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self[prefix..(i-1)], "TOPRIGHT", 5, 0) end
frame:SetID(i) self[prefix..i] = frame end
